short_summary: contract for support of the measurement equipment
description: Support for measurement systems best suited for             Calibration and maintenance of spectral radiation and scanning bandwidths                Maintenance of reference matching multicursors                Support for increased data transfer speed                Maintenance of know-how with new equipment                Other             Modulation and telecommunication techniques             Measurement of the microscopic features of surfaces             Pollutants and dust trace on surfaces spanns                Maintenance, adjustment, report output distortion and anet qwq mod included
